creator: cboris@alphatec.neobee.net
text:
It would be nice feature to filter files by their last modified attribute
( for a purpose of copying files ,deleting ... ) e.g. :
<copy todir="${build.temp.dir}/src">
   <fileset after="02/20/2002" dir="${src.dir}"/>
</copy>

Please investigate the selectors concept of Ant 1.5. It should allow you to do
what you want (and much more besides)
creator: conor@apache.org
